email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Could you consider mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the vessel's specifications and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, built in 2018, and fully compliant with all regulations. Regarding the freight rate, the best I can do is $49.50 per ton. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.50 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with this rate. Please confirm the laycan of 15-20 October and send over the charter party for review. Also, can we cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ve confirmed the laycan of 15-20 October. I can agree to cap demurrage at $18,000 per day. I’ll send over the charter party draft shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. I’ve reviewed the charter party and everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the agreed terms. Looking forward to a smooth shipment. Best, John
